biography.summary: Shelley Moore Capito is the senior United States Senator from West Virginia, serving since 2015, and previously represented West Virginia in the U.S. House. A Republican, she focuses on infrastructure, energy, and health care policy, and is active in Senate committees related to Appropriations and Environment and Public Works.

contact.office_address: 170 Russell Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Supports market-based approaches and gradual reform
Supports domestic energy development and pipeline infrastructure

timeline.event: Elected to U.S. Senate; began serving as a member from West Virginia.
Re-elected to the U.S. Senate; continues to serve as a senior senator from West Virginia.
